title.en: The Practice of Getting to Know Educational Institutions

structural_units.address:
Jakobi 5
51005 Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Students visit different types of educational institutions, reflect on what they have experienced, and articulate their strengths and development areas as learners. Visits to educational institutions also offer the opportunity to get to know potential practice schools.
description.et: Üliõpilased külastavad erinevat tüüpi haridusasutusi, reflekteerivad kogetu üle ja sõnastavad oma tugevused ja arenduskohad õppijana. Haridusasutuste külastused pakuvad võimalust tutvuda ka potentsiaalsete praktikakoolidega.

objectives.en: The purpose of the subject is to enable students to visit different educational institutions, reflect on what they have experienced, and thereby find strengths and areas for development as a learner and, as a result, make more informed choices when studying and when choosing an internship school.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on võimaldada üliõpilastel külastada erinevat tüüpi haridusasutusi, reflekteerida kogetu üle ja leida seeläbi tugevused ja arenduskohad õppijana ning teha sellest tulenevalt teadlikumaid valikuid õppides ja ka praktikakooli valikul.

learning_outcomes.en: Has visited various types of educational institutions and reflected on what he experienced.
learning_outcomes.et: * On külastanud erinevat tüüpi haridusasutusi ja reflekteerinud kogetu üle.

learning_outcomes.en: Has formulated her/his strengths and areas for development as a learner based on his experience when visiting educational institutions.
learning_outcomes.et: * On haridusasutuste külastamisel kogetust tulenevalt sõnastanud oma tugevused ja arenduskohad õppijana.

learning_outcomes.en: Makes more informed choices due to visiting educational institutions, including when choosing an practice school.
learning_outcomes.et: * Teeb haridusasutuste külastamisel kogetust tulenevalt teadlikumaid valikuid sh praktikakooli valikul.
